member.name: M:LDC.Atlas.Services.PaymentRequestInterface.Application.Behaviors.ValidationResultExtension.AddToDictionary(FluentValidation.Results.ValidationResult,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Stores the errors in a ValidationResult object to the specified dictionary.
member.param: The dictionary to store the errors in.
An optional prefix. If omitted, the property names will be the keys. If specified, the prefix will be concatenated to the property name with a period. Eg "user.Name"

member.name: M:LDC.Atlas.Services.PaymentRequestInterface.Controllers.PaymentRequestController.ProcessPaymentRequestdatachangelog(LDC.Atlas.Services.PaymentRequestInterface.Application.Commands.ProcessInterfaceDataChangeLogsRequest)
member.param: The identifier of the data change log to process.
